approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
Improve efficiency of the V-KYC team in accessing recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT data server team to provide recordings, which are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server. This process is manual and time-consuming. This project aims to streamline the process by providing a self-service portal.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal should be provided to the leads of VKYC process (TL & Process Manager).
All recordings of V-KYC shall be made available on this portal.
Recordings should be fetched as and when required.
Recordings should be searchable by LAN ID.
Recordings should be available date and month wise.
Users should be able to upload an Excel or text file with a list of LAN IDs (up to 50).
The system should trigger a backend API call to process the request upon file upload.
Results should be displayed in a tabular format with a 'Download All' option.
The table should have pagination displaying only 10 records at a time.
Only 10 records at a time should be downloaded.
File upload should be in CSV/TXT format.
Post clicking the LAN the recording download shall start.

functional_requirements: Date and month-wise filtering of recordings.
Bulk download functionality (upload file with LAN IDs).
Display of recording details (User ID, Call Duration, Status, Time, Date, NFS VKYC Upload Time).
non_functional_requirements: Performance: The system should be responsive and load quickly.
Security: Access to the portal should be restricted to authorized users.
Usability: The portal should be user-friendly and easy to navigate.
success_criteria: The portal is successfully deployed and accessible to authorized users.
Users can easily search and download V-KYC recordings.
The new system reduces the time taken to retrieve recordings compared to the current process.
Audit requirements are met with readily available recordings.
constraints: Recordings are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
Limited access to the screen (only Team leaders).
assumptions: The necessary infrastructure (server, network) is available.
The backend API for processing requests will be available.
risks: Technical issues with the NFS server.
Performance issues due to large data volumes.

recommendations: Include more details on the API integration.
Specify the security measures to be implemented.
Add details on error handling and logging.

identified_gaps: Specific security requirements are not defined.
Error handling and logging requirements are not specified.
recommendations_for_completion: Define security requirements (authentication, authorization, data encryption).
Specify error handling and logging mechanisms.
